description: The file is a React frontend app component ('App.tsx') which manages routing, layout, authentication context, and navigation for the web application.

classes.name: Layout
classes.description: A React functional component that provides a layout with a sidebar, main content area, and notifications, wrapping its children.

classes.name: PrivateRoute
classes.description: A React component that enforces authentication by checking user context and conditionally rendering children or redirecting to login.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Renders the main layout structure with sidebar, content area, and notifications.

methods.name: PrivateRoute
methods.description: Renders children if user is authenticated, otherwise redirects to login page.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component that sets up routing, authentication context, and page layout.
